dcterms:description: The Realistic Synthetic dataset contains 8 synthetic scenes, each with 100 training images and 200 testing images, all at 800 × 800 resolution.

dcterms:description: The Real Forward-Facing dataset consists of 8 complex real-world scenes, each containing 20 to 62 images at 1,008 × 756 resolution.
